mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_TITLE CONTENTTITLE,CONTENT_CONTENT CONTENTCONTENT,CONTENT_ID CONTENTID,EMPLOYEE_NO EMPLOYEENO,BOARD_ID BOARDID, (SELECT '[' || (SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID = EMPLOYEE.TEAM_ID) || '] ' || EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = CONTENT.EMPLOYEE_NO) EMPLOYEENAME FROM CONTENT WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
SELECT BOARD_NAME BOARDNAME, BOARD_ID BOARDID, BOARD_AUTHORITY BOARDAUTHORITY, IS_TEAM ISTEAM FROM BOARD

SELECT CONTENTTITLE,EMPLOYEENAME,WRITEDATE, NO, CONTENTID FROM ( SELECT CONTENT_TITLE CONTENTTITLE, CONTENT_ID CONTENTID, (SELECT '[' || (SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID = EMPLOYEE.TEAM_ID) || '] ' || EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = CONTENT.EMPLOYEE_NO) EMPLOYEENAME,
TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITEDATE , ROWNUM NO FROM CONTENT WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} ) ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT CONTENTTITLE,EMPLOYEENAME,WRITEDATE, NO, CONTENTID FROM ( SELECT CONTENT_TITLE CONTENTTITLE, CONTENT_ID CONTENTID, (SELECT '[' || (SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID = EMPLOYEE.TEAM_ID) || '] ' || EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = CONTENT.EMPLOYEE_NO) EMPLOYEENAME, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITEDATE , ROWNUM NO FROM CONTENT WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND TEAM_ID= #{teamId} ) ORDER BY NO DESC
